projects.title: FuturePrintAI.com
projects.description: AI-powered design and printing platform enabling creative professionals to transform ideas into physical products with intelligent automation.

projects.title: PERT Calibration System
projects.description: Statistical project planning tool using Program Evaluation and Review Technique (PERT) with empirical self-calibration for accurate time estimation.

projects.title: Redis Performance Optimization
projects.description: High-performance caching system optimization achieving 3x throughput improvement through configuration tuning and monitoring.

projects.title: System Security Hardening
projects.description: Comprehensive security configuration including SSH hardening, firewall rules (UFW), and secure credential management using GNOME Keyring.
